column4: hello. my friend has plugged in 2 monitors, only 1 works. he is hoping for extended desktop. he has got ati radeon card with unknown driver (how in xorg under Device section Identifier "Configured Video Device"
so hes got to install a driver ?
I remember someone coming through with that problem before, you somehow gotta get ur computer to understand that you want a dual-monitor, search the forums, I remembered to have found good howtos
